from langchain_text_splitters import CharacterTextSplitter
from axiestudio.custom import Component
from axiestudio.io import HandleInput, IntInput, MessageTextInput, Output
from axiestudio.schema import Data
from axiestudio.utils.util import unescape_string
from langchain.schema import Document

class SplitTextComponent(Component):
    display_name: str = "Split Text"
    description: str = "Divide o texto em partes com base em critérios especificados."
    icon = "scissors-line-dashed"
    name = "SplitText"

    inputs = [
        HandleInput(
            name="data_inputs",
            display_name="Entradas de Dados",
            info="Os dados a serem divididos.",
            input_types=["Data"],
            is_list=True,
        ),
        IntInput(
            name="chunk_overlap",
            display_name="Sobreposição de Partes",
            info="Número de caracteres para sobrepor entre as partes.",
            value=200,
        ),
        IntInput(
            name="chunk_size",
            display_name="Tamanho da Parte",
            info="Número máximo de caracteres em cada parte.",
            value=1000,
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="separator",
            display_name="Separador",
            info="O caractere para dividir o texto. Padrão é nova linha.",
            value="\n",
        ),
    ]

    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Partes", name="chunks", method="split_text"),
    ]

    def _docs_to_data(self, docs):
        return [Data(text=doc.page_content, data=doc.metadata) for doc in docs]

    def split_text(self) -> list[Data]:
        separator = unescape_string(self.separator)

        documents = []
        for _input in self.data_inputs:
            if isinstance(_input, Data):
                text = _input.text
                if not isinstance(text, str):
                    text = str(text)  # Converte para string se necessário
                document = Document(page_content=text, metadata=_input.data)
                documents.append(document)

        splitter = CharacterTextSplitter(
            chunk_overlap=self.chunk_overlap,
            chunk_size=self.chunk_size,
            separator=separator,
        )
        docs = splitter.split_documents(documents)
        data = self._docs_to_data(docs)
        self.status = data
        return data
